attributes.action: Erect a Statue to Salute The Bearded Lady of Guildford Town
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is not often we have the chance to salute a still living legend.  The Bearded Lady of Guildford should be acknowledged with this tribute whilst her beard still flows freely.
 
This is in no way a malicious petition.  The Bearded Lady has a big place in the hearts of the people of the area and we wish her memory to live on for the future childen of Surrey.  The statue should stand as a symbol to freedom of personal expression!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
